name: B🎳wling
description:
Made in 24h for the fun while listening to At0mium for his VG Labs video.

Bowling is made with GB Studio 2.0 beta version.

Be a pin placer master so the bowling ball can strike all the pins ! But be careful with the timing.

Z : (A Button) Place pin, pass dialogue
X : (B Button )Reset gauge
Enter : (Start) Pass the training

Credits to krümel and Deer Tears for the free sound assets.
